<title level="1" pfs="">[Daring Danika](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2001)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Daring Danika](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2001)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 28

**Perception** +7

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
lion tamer's outfit, short stool, [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

+2 circumstance vs. [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
whip +10 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stool bash +6 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Sting of the Lash** <actions string="Single Action" />  Danika targets a single [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) creature within reach of her whip to spur its ferocity. That creature gains 5 temporary Hit Points. The target is temporarily immune to Sting of the Lash for 24 hours.

</column>
name: Daring Danika
primary_source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 28
